original_text: And he said to the people of Israel, “When your children ask their fathers in times to come, ‘What do these stones mean?’
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손들에게 말하여 이르되 후일에 너희의 자손들이 그들의 아버지에게 묻기를 이 돌들은 무슨 뜻이니이까 하거든

sentences.original_text: And he said to the people of Israel,
“When your children ask their fathers in times to come,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 자녀들이 훗날 그 아버지에게 묻기를,
